source: Podle všeho šlo zcela určitě o pokračující bitvu.
target: It appears that this was definitely an ongoing battle.
The new age brought new instructions.

source: Jenže změnila název a IČO a nebylo co řešit.
target: The company then changed its company ID number, and that was it.

source: Chodí s dopomocí a jezdí na kole.
target: He's walking with help, and riding a bike.

source: V Londýně zemřel cyklista po srážce s automobilem.
target: A cyclist has died in a collision involving a car in London.
